margaritas.name: Classic Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and a slice of lime for garnish
margaritas.directions: Combine the tequila, cointreau, lime juice and simple syrup in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake until cold, and strain into a chilled, salt-rimmed rocks glass. Garnish with lime, and serve.

margaritas.name: Blue Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and a slice of lime for garnish
margaritas.directions: Combine the tequila, Blue Curacao and lime juice in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake until cold, and strain into a chilled, salt-rimmed rocks glass. Garnish with lime, and serve.

margaritas.name: Strawberry Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and a fresh strawberry for garnish
margaritas.directions: Combine the tequila, Triple Sec, Strawberry Schnaps, lemon juice and strawberries in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake until cold, and strain into a chilled, salt-rimmed rocks glass. Garnish a strawberry, and serve.

margaritas.name: Smashed Watermelon Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and a slice of watermelon for garnish
margaritas.directions: In a mason jar muddle the watermelon and 5 mint leaves together into a puree and strain. Next add the grapefruit juice, juice of half a lime and the tequila as well as some ice. Put a lid on the jar and shake. Pour into a glass and add more ice. Garnish with fresh mint and a small slice of watermelon.

margaritas.name: Cucumber Jalapeño Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and slices of lime for garnish
margaritas.directions: In a cocktail shaker, add cucumber slices, lime slices, lime juice, jalapeno slices, and sugar and muddle together. Add tequila and Cointreau and fill with ice. Shake until cold, and strain into a chilled, salt-rimmed rocks glass. Garnish with cucumber and serve.

margaritas.name: Mango Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and a slice of lime for garnish
margaritas.directions: Add the tequila, Cointreau, lime juice, frozen mango, simple syrup and ice to a blender. Blend until frothy and fully combined strain into a chilled, salt-rimmed rocks glass. Garnish with lime, and serve.

margaritas.name: Basil Lime Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and a slice of lime for garnish
margaritas.directions: Combine the tequila, lime juice, simple syrup and basil leaves in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake until cold, and strain into a chilled, salt-rimmed rocks glass. Garnish with lime, basil leaves, and serve.

margaritas.name: Ginger Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and sliced lime ginger for garnish
margaritas.directions: To make Honey syrup, combine equal parts of honey and warm water, stirring until honey dissolves. Muddle the 2 ginger slices with the honey syrup in a coctail shaker. Add the tequila, lime juice and ice. Shake until cold, then strain into a chilled, salt-rimmed rocks glass. Garnish with lime a slice of ginger, and serve.

margaritas.name: Spicy Jalapeño Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and fresh sliced jalapeño and lime for garnish
margaritas.directions: To make Jalapeño Simple Syrup by combe 1/2 cup of water and 1/2 cup of sugar with 1 sliced jalapeño in a small pot. Bring to a boil and set aside to cool. When cool add, to a coctail shaker with ice along wiht the teqila and lime juice. Shake until cold, then strain into a salt-rimmed coctail glass. Garnish with fresh slices of lime and jalapeño.

margaritas.name: Peach Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and fresh sliced peach and lime for garnish
margaritas.directions: Peel and dice peach, muddle in a coctail shaker. Add the tequila, lime juice, peach schnapps and ice, shake until cool. When cool add, to a coctail shaker with ice along wiht the teqila and lime juice. Shake until cold, then strain into a salt-rimmed coctail glass. Garnish with fresh slices of lime and peach.

margaritas.name: Grapefruit Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and fresh sliced grapefruit for garnish
margaritas.directions: Combine the tequila, Triple Sec, grapefruit juice and Grenadine syrup in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake until cold, and strain into a salt-rimmed glass. Garnish with a slice of fresh grapefruit and serve.

margaritas.name: Golden Margarita
ingredients: coarse salt and a lime wedge
margaritas.directions: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, pour the tequila, orange liqueur, lime juice, and sour mix. Add a splash of orange juice if you prefer. Shake well and strain into a salt rimmed glass, garnish with a lime wedge and serve.

margaritas.name: Rosemary Margarita
ingredients: coarse sugar, rosemary and a slice of lime for garnish
margaritas.directions: Firs make rosemary simple syrup by bringing 1 cup of water, 1 cup of sugar and 2 rosemary sprig to a boil. Stir until sugar has completely dissolved. Let cool. Fill a coctail shaker with ice and add all ingredients. Shake well and pour over a sugar rimmed glass and garnish with a sprig of rosemary and a slice of lime.

margaritas.name: Champagne Margarita
ingredients: dry champagne or sparkling wine to top
coarse salt and a lime wedge
margaritas.directions: First make simple syrup: combine sugar and water in a small saucepan over medium-high heat and whisk to dissolve sugar. Bring to a boil then remove from heat and cool. Combine tequila, lime juice, simple syrup, and orange liqueur in a cocktail shaker with plenty of ice and shake vigorously. Pour over ice into salt rimmed glass and top with champagne. Garnish with a wedge of lime.

margaritas.name: Pink Lemonade Margartia
ingredients: corse salt, lemon wedges, mint leaves and fresh raspberries for garnish
margaritas.directions: Combine raspberry lemonade, tequila, lemon juice, and orange liqueur in an ice filled cocktail shaker.  Shake well for a few seconds to incorporate and chill. Pour into glass with ice, garnish with a lemon slice, raspberries, and mint leaves.
